description:
{()[\/^^|\| |}0|}&3|*\

You come to this long forgotten video game for knowledge. What will you find?

This game is part of the Chronological Haunted Anomalous Interconnected Narrative (or C.H.A.I.N). The full series of games can be played here. This is number 13 in the chain.

(The Linux version looks differently than the others because of a bad shader, but I thought it had a unique and interesting look, so I'm including it)
